title: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky Challenges the West on Russian Aggression
sub_head: ‘Has our world completely forgotten the mistakes of the 20th century?’ he asks conferees at Munich.
body:
Munich
When I first attended the annual Munich Security Conference three decades ago, the thrill of victory in the Cold War was receding and had been replaced by concern about whether the North Atlantic Treaty Organization could survive without its common enemy—Soviet communism.
